post_title: This includes even Camila Cabello
post_content:
Camila Cabello is another celebrity who has promoted the use of meditation in times of such crisis. The picture that was uploaded to Instagram was accompanied by a long, long caption. It spoke about how she had been using meditation to help her deal with severe anxiety and stress. She also spoke about love, compassion, and empathy, which we could all use a little bit of right now!
View this post on Instagram

meditation has changed my life in the last few months. I didnâ€™t share this with you guys at the time because honestly I was just trying to be okay, but I was experiencing severe anxiety. it was meditation- it was practicing every single day multiple times a day that has been healing me, and, more than just helping me manage strong emotions like anxiety and stress, itâ€™s making me a better human. not only does it help in times like this with stress and anxiety, meditation is the practice of strengthening habits like empathy, love, and compassion- making you feel more connected to not only everybody around you , but living beings in general like animals, plants, and the earth, which is a living being, itself. In times like these, especially as young people, even if we are healthy, itâ€™s important to practice compassion and help others that could be suffering. We are in this together, letâ€™s not be indifferent to others risk. itâ€™s our responsibility to do whatever it takes to keep everyone safe. Empathy to othersâ€™ reality and solidarity could make the difference in hard moments like this. We canâ€™t think that we will be unaffected because we feel young and healthy. we have parents, grandparents, friends, and neighbors, and we donâ€™t want to be a part of the problem when we could be part of the solution. So Iâ€™d like you to take 10 minutes of your day today to either look up loving kindness meditation on Calm or YouTube. Or just follow these instructions: close your eyes and sit with your spine upright and feel gravity grounding your body to the earthâ€™s surface and supporting you. Take three deep breaths and then begin to just notice the natural flow of your breath. Being aware of breathing in, breathing out. Following every inhale and exhale with your attention. Once your mind has stilled. Picture every human in the world right now, elders, people that have respiratory problems and are vulnerable, picture the people that are vulnerable, picture their families, and say â€œMay you be healthy. May you be safe. May you be free from illness. May you be well.â€ Repeat until you really feel it in your heart â¤ï¸- love you guys, please stay safe !

A post shared by camila (@camila_cabello) on Mar 16, 2020 at 1:24pm PDT

post_title: They are getting those workouts in
post_content:
Who better to inspire fitness goals than Chris Hemsworth? Staying fit and sane is a necessity during this period and his health and fitness program that will last for six weeks sure is helping us! The Thor star shared the news via a short video on Instagram and wrote about how we needed to focus on living healthier and happier!
View this post on Instagram

Hi there all, during this period of self isolation and uncertainty, I am offering six weeks of my health and fitness program @Centrfit for FREE! Go to centr.com and sign-up. Centr was founded to make health and happiness accessible to all, and I hope that this will make that access even easier during the current global health crisis. I think now more than ever is when we need to focus on what I believe to be the 3 key pillars to living healthier and happier- movement, nutrition, and mental fitness. In recent weeks Centr has seen a groundswell of support from our customers and communities, with thousands of members around the world coming together and sharing how the program has brought them positivity and support during these difficult times. Available at centr.com only, for new users only.

A post shared by Chris Hemsworth (@chrishemsworth) on Mar 22, 2020 at 4:21pm PDT

post_content:
It should not have been a thing in this scenario, but many people tend to take all kinds of advice only from celebrities. What we need right now is to stay indoors and pop queen Ariana Grande minced no words when it came to asking people to quarantine and self-isolate to avoid putting other people at risk. Seriously, your hip hop yoga class can wait, Karen. Thank you, next!

like your hip hop yoga class can fucking wait i promise

post_title: Some stepped out to get groceries but ensured they followed all the rules
post_content:
Not all have the privilege to stay indoors and that is on period. Gwyneth Paltrow, much like some, has been leaving her home to get groceries, but most importantly, has been doing so while following the rules of distancing. Donning a mask and gloves, she stepped out to the local farmers market to get essentials and urged people to stay indoors unless absolutely necessary!
View this post on Instagram

@bradfalchuk and I were grateful to learn our local farmers market was open this morning; we walked there (keeping lots of distance) and donned masks and gloves once we got nearer to the market, only taking them off when we were almost home and there were no other pedestrians in close proximity. Yesterday I heard tales of crowded hiking trails and parks. Although we are all on a learning curve and arenâ€™t always perfect as we figure out this temporary new normal, we must take the orders seriously and not abuse the freedoms we still have; grocery store and essential errand runs, bike rides or walks (being disciplined about correct protocol). Itâ€™s not the time for denial. We must take this seriously and shelter in place. Itâ€™s time for nesting, reading, cleaning out closets, doing something youâ€™ve always wanted to do (write a book, learn an instrument or a language or learn to code online, draw or paint) going through photos, cooking, and reconnecting on a deeper level with the people you love. I find hope in the generosity, love, protection and care I see and feel through out our country everyday and my heart goes out to everyone directly affected or simply in fear. We will get through and I bet you our humanity will shine like never before â¤ï¸

A post shared by Gwyneth Paltrow (@gwynethpaltrow) on Mar 22, 2020 at 4:44pm PDT

post_title: Tom Hanks dug out an old gadget
post_content:
Tom Hanks actually was a COVID-19 patient and TBH has still been a beacon of hope and joy throughout his quarantine and treatment. In fact, he even shared a picture of his typewriter called CORONA (oh, the irony) which he used to love. He clearly is getting back to writing just as many of us are picking up our old hobbies!
View this post on Instagram

Hey folks. Good News: One week after testing Positive, in self-isolation, the symptoms are much the same. No fever but the blahs. Folding the laundry and doing the dishes leads to a nap on the couch. Bad news: My wife @ritawilson has won 6 straight hands of Gin Rummy and leads by 201 points. But I have learned not to spread my Vegemite so thick. I travelled here with a typewriter, one I used to love. We are all in this together. Flatten the curve. Hanx
